entries.name: Properties
entries: Forging Conditions: 15 WIS or resistance to Psychic Damage.

Armor Effects: Each day at Dawn, roll 1d2. On a 1, you have advantage on one type of saving throw against magic (roll 1d6 to decide). On a 2, you have disadvantage to one type of saving throw against magic (roll 1d6 to decide).

Weapon Effects: After hitting a creature with this weapon you can force them to make a DC15 CHA Saving Throw, and on a fail are affected by the Confusion Spell until the start of your next turn (you do not concentrate on this). A creature who succeeds or fails the saving throw they are immune to this effect for the next 24 hours.
